main.itemsim

Class FindSimilarItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.itemsim.FindSimilarItem

  • public class FindSimilarItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a keyword, this class will call the Ebay API, get a list of product items. Then for each item, we will return another item which is most similar to the given item

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FindSimilarItem(java.util.List<Item> candidates, int bucket)
      construct a class from list of items and bucket size init candidates and build the index
      FindSimilarItem(java.lang.String keyWord, int bucket, boolean dedupID)
      given a keyword, and bucket size, construct a FindSimilarItem class init candidates and build the index

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGT(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> GT, java.lang.String a, java.lang.String b) 
      void enumerateAndPrint()
      For each item, find its most similar item print the result using the following format Item_ID_1 \t Item_ID_2
      void enumerateAndPrintDebug()
      For each item, find its most similar item print the result using the debug format: print item's title and URL
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      int searchSimItem(int searchIndex)
      given a searchIndex of one item, find the item which is the most similar to the searching item
